component._description: Decodes an encoded stream with only audio or video.

property.name: media-type
property._description: Decides whether the component decodes an audio or a video stream. Should be set to either "audio" or "video".

property.name: blacklist
property._description: Forbid the decoder from using some elements.

property.name: width
property._description: The width to scale the video at.

property.name: height
property._description: The height to scale the video at.

property.name: is-square
property._description: Whether to scale to a 1:1 pixel aspect ratio.

property.name: add-borders
property._description: Add black borders if DAR can't be kept.

component._description: Decodes an encoded stream with audio and video.

property.name: blacklist
property._description: Forbid the decoder from using some elements.

property.name: width
property._description: The width to scale the video at.

property.name: height
property._description: The height to scale the video at.

property.name: is-square
property._description: Whether to scale to a 1:1 pixel aspect ratio.

property.name: add-borders
property._description: Add black borders if DAR can't be kept.
